author: realbigsean
content: It's unexpected we would send that field on the `engine_forkchoiceUpdatedV1` endpoint so I will look into that. How LH works is we check  `engine_exchangeCapabilities` for the latest version of all endpoint sand always call that versions. Does nethermind expose all the latest versions of the endpoints on exchange capabiliies ?

author: __flcl
content: I saw some errors related to engine_exchangeCapabilities in a previous run with an old image, probably fixed

author: __flcl
content: So can be not a problem anymore
